mapper.select: select username, folder, thumbnail, original, price, createdt from photo where username = #{username} and folder = #{folder} order by createdt asc

select folder.username, photo.folder, photo.thumbnail, photo.original, photo.price, photo.createdt from folder, photo where folder.username = photo.username and folder.seq = photo.folder and folder.guest = #{guest} order by photo.createdt asc
mapper.insert: insert into photo (username, folder, thumbnail, original, price, createdt) values (#{username}, #{folder}, #{thumbnail}, #{original}, #{price}, #{createdt})
mapper.select: delete from photo where username = #{username} and folder = #{folder} and thumbnail = #{thumbnail} returning original
mapper.delete: delete from photo where username = #{username} and folder = #{folder}
